name: Red Handed (BazzaGibbs, Jim_JustGaming, NC, Scara2016)
description:
Red Handed is a point-and click adventure game where you play as a rouge detective investigating a mysterious mansion to solve a missing persons case. Discover many items to use in your investigation and interrogate suspects to catch the culprit, Red Handed. 

Non-linear Storyline

Playing as a detective, it is your job to collect the right evidence to catch the culprit Red Handed. By interacting with the characters in this mansion, your actions affect your reputation. Help out the chef in her tasks and she may be willing to give you more information.

Simple Controls

Spend more time immersed in the story, and less time with the controls. Red Handed can be played with the mouse only - just point and click to move around the mansion, click through expressive conversation dialog, and use an easy Journal system to review your evidence at any time.
